name: Claw Bot 2.0
description:
Complete series of challenges using claw spinning robot. 

Throw stuff at the stuff and explore everything.

Controls: 

  • Movement: WSAD
  • Grab/Release: Right Mouse Button

Tips:

  • Activate dispenser to get additional barrels.
  • You can grab object and spin to throw them further.
  • Buttons can activate or deactivate nearby devices.
  • Feel free to explore keyboard - we may forget something there
